name: Pizza Deliryum
description:
(Download if WebGl does not work) Pizza Deliryum

Deliver pizza and fight Besla bots. What is real? I don't know but is you don't work PIZZA BOSS wont pay you.

A game  made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 - With the theme "It Is Not Real".

Controls:

WASD: move

Space: jump

E: interact

ctrl: slide

LMB: shoot

RMB: Aim 

Credits:
